casename: ABC Co v XYZ Co Ltd
counsel: VK Rajah, SC, with Allen Choong and Priya Selvam (Rajan & Tann) for the Applicants; Alvin Yeo, SC, with Tay Peng Cheng (Wong Partnership) for the Respondents
tags-parsed: Arbitration/Award/Interim award/Party seeking to set aside interim award/Article 34 of the UNCITRAL Model Law on International Commercial Arbitration/Whether new grounds may be added to originating motion after expiry of prescribed three-month period
